import React, { useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import toast, { Toaster } from "react-hot-toast"; import "../App.css"; import { useNavigate, Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; const SignUp = () => { const [loader, setLoader] = useState(false); const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors }, } = useForm(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleFormSubmit = async (formData) => { setLoader(true); try { const response = await axios.post("http://localhost:3001/api/register", formData); console.log(response.data); setLoader(false); toast.success("You have been registered successfully!"); setTimeout(() => { navigate("/auth/confirmEmail"); }, 1000); } catch (err) { setLoader(false); if (err.response && err.response.data) { const errorResponse = err.response.data; if (errorResponse.details) { const validationMessages = errorResponse.details .map((detail) => detail.message) .join(", "); toast.error(`Validation Error: ${validationMessages}`); } else if (errorResponse.msg) { toast.error(`Error: ${errorResponse.msg}`); } } else { const generalErrorMessage = `There was an error: ${err.message}`; toast.error(generalErrorMessage); } console.log("Error occurred during form submission:", err); } }; return (
{errors.name && (
{errors.name.message}
)}
{errors.number && (
{errors.number.message}
)}
{errors.address && (
{errors.address.message}
)} {errors.email && (
{errors.email.message}
)} {errors.password && (
{errors.password.message}
)}

); };
